Description: Ostracon, fragment from the rim-section of a pale-red pottery bowl with convex sides and rounded lip, the outer surfaces are covered with a buff-coloured slip, the lower section of the exterior is grooved and faint traces of three lines of red-painted Coptic text survive.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394495) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394495)
